original_title: EXO PLANET #2 The EXO'luxion in Seoul
overview: EXO PLANET #2 – The EXO'luxion was the second tour of South Korean-Chinese boy band EXO and features the current 9 members of the group. It is a recording of one of the concert dates in 2015 in Seoul in the enclosure Olympic Park Gymnastics Stadium (better known as Olympic Gymnastics Arena and Olympic Gymnastics Hall).
title: EXO PLANET #2 The EXO'luxion in Seoul
